intro:
VIRUS-19 has ravaged the world!
Take control of a mindless citizen and live through a 7-day quarantine inside of Lockdown City.
description:
Isolation Story is a LIFE-SIM style game where you buy supplies, avoid people, and manage your SICKNESS using the new GOV PHONE.

Drink water, wash your hands, and use Medical Supplies to keep the SICKNESS at bay.
Can you endure 7 days of Isolation inside of LOCKDOWN CITY? The game where speaking to NPC's can make you sick!
Among other things...

Manage your FOOD, SICKNESS, and HAPPINESS to survive 

Meet and interact with the other residents of LOCKDOWN CITY

Explore quirky subplots

Get into trouble with the authorities

Collect and battle USB-MON

+ More!
